synopsis.text: It's a tale of passion, friendship, and cycling as Sakamichi Onoda, an otaku with a love for anime, sets out to revive his school's disbanded anime club. However, his life takes an unexpected turn when seasoned cyclists spot him expertly maneuvering his bulky mamachari bike, a relic from his childhood. Impressed by his cycling prowess, they invite him to join the bicycle racing club instead. As Onoda delves deeper into the world of cycling, he forms a unique bond with fellow cyclist Makishima, sharing his fervor for anime merchandise along the way. Follow the Sohoku team as they rigorously train for the Inter-High competition, tackling the challenging slopes of Minegayama and strengthening their camaraderie in this thrilling anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
